Things I'm interested in ...

I'm mostly writing about various topics in machine learning. My motivation is that if you want to explain something to other people, you'll first have to properly understand it yourself. By breaking down a seemingly complex topic and understanding it's individual components, it's often possible to get a atomic understanding of the entire topic. Then by reassembling the individual components and explaining their relationship and interaction with each other, the whole thing suddenly makes sense and you get that 'Aha!'-Moment.

Well, at least that's what I'm trying to do here ... :-P
